system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Spears)}

Benefits

When wielding a halberd, long spear, rifle bayonet, or short spear the Critical Threat range is 14-18. Also, the character can strike adjacent foes with the weapon

Normal

The Critical Threat range for a halberd, long spear, rifle bayonet, or short spear is 16-18.
